thread.title: Gap Creek Ranch Offers a Rustic Venue for Farm Weddings, Receptions and Vacations for Couples and Families Wanting to Get Away in the Waco, Stephenville and Comanche Areas
thread.title_full: Gap Creek Ranch Offers a Rustic Venue for Farm Weddings, Receptions and Vacations for Couples and Families Wanting to Get Away in the Waco, Stephenville and Comanche Areas

title: Gap Creek Ranch Offers a Rustic Venue for Farm Weddings, Receptions and Vacations for Couples and Families Wanting to Get Away in the Waco, Stephenville and Comanche Areas
text: Gap Creek Ranch Offers a Rustic Venue for Farm Weddings, Receptions and Vacations for Couples and Families Wanting to Get Away in the Waco, Stephenville and Comanche Areas Ranch and farm offers venue for weddings, vacations and private parties We provide a peaceful, rustic farm setting for a wedding and reception...We can help make your special day memorable. We also provide a great venue for a secluded vacation, private party or a retreat. WACO-STEPHENVILLE, TX, August 04,   Gap Creek Ranch in Hico, Texas offers a private and rustic venue for a farm wedding and reception, vacation rentals and private parties. The 275 acre ranch sits on land originally farmed by the Martin Knudson family in 1920. "We provide a peaceful, rustic farm setting for a wedding and reception," said Sandy McMahan, Owner-Manager of Gap Creek Ranch. "We can help make your special day memorable. We also provide a great venue for a secluded vacation, private party or a retreat. Call us and secure a date." To learn more about Gap Creek Ranch, please visit their web site:
